email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Given the current market, could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. Given our long-standing relationship, I can adjust the freight rate to $48.50 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and I can confirm the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.50 sounds reasonable. Could we finalize the laycan as October 15-20 and confirm the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional terms. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. I’ve attached the full vessel details for the MV Ocean Star, including the laycan of October 15-20 and the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else to proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $48.50 per metric ton, laycan October 15-20, and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your business, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah
